title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: The fun never stops!You are cordially invited to take part in the Pragmatic Play Casino’s Drops and Wins network competition hosted by Betplay.io. The winners of this network event will get a prize pool totaling EUR 245,000. You will have an exciting experience with fantastic victories because this series comprises four weekly tournaments! The entertaining competition will be held from May 3 to May 31, 2023.Tournament Schedule:Week 1: 3 May 2023, 7:01 p.m. CET to 10 May 2023, 6:59 p.m. CETWeek 2: 10 May 2023, 7:01 p.m. CET to 17 May 2023, 6:59 p.m. CETWeek 3: 17 May 2023, 7:01 p.m. CET to 24 May 2023, 6:59 p.m. CETWeek 4: 24 May 2023, 7:01 p.m. CET to 31 May 2023, 6:59 p.m. CETThe minimum bet amount in this campaign is 0.50 EUR. The exciting tourney is also accessible in the currencies such as USD, TRY, TND, BRL, and THB.To join, you can play any of Pragmatic Play’s participating games in the list: Wolf Gold, Mustang Gold, Sweet Bonanza, John Hunter and the Tomb of the Scarab Queen, Madame Destiny Megaways, Gems Bonanza, Great Rhino Megaways, John Hunter and the Book of Tut, The Dog House, The Dog House Megaways, Chilli Heat, Fruit Party, The Knight King and more!If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service.Betplay.ioThe #1 Bitcoin Lightning Casino
